mapper.insert: INSERT INTO external_resource (title, url, description, category, favicon, user_id, is_favorite, visit_count, last_visit_time, create_time) VALUES (#{title}, #{url}, #{description}, #{category}, #{favicon}, #{userId}, #{isFavorite}, #{visitCount}, #{lastVisitTime}, #{createTime})
mapper.update: UPDATE external_resource SET title=#{title}, url=#{url}, description=#{description}, category=#{category}, favicon=#{favicon}, user_id=#{userId}, is_favorite=#{isFavorite}, visit_count=#{visitCount}, last_visit_time=#{lastVisitTime}, create_time=#{createTime} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, url, description, category, favicon, user_id, is_favorite, visit_count, last_visit_time, create_time FROM external_resource WHERE id=#{id}
SELECT id, title, url, description, category, favicon, user_id, is_favorite, visit_count, last_visit_time, create_time FROM external_resource ORDER BY id DESC
SELECT id, title, url, description, category, favicon, user_id, is_favorite, visit_count, last_visit_time, create_time FROM external_resource WHERE user_id=#{userId}
